FuncDef: This command specifies the gateway IP address of the DHCPv4 packets sent by the system. IPsec DHCP Relay uses only thegi-addressconfiguration found under the IPsec gateway and does not take into accountgi-addresswithsrc-ip-addrconfiguration below other interfaces

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the host IP address to be used for DHCP relay packets.
